description.value:
Somewhere in your family’s history, a relative made a deal with a devil, and that pact has influenced your family line ever since. In you, it manifests in direct and obvious ways, granting you powers and abilities. While your fate is still your own, you can’t help but wonder if your ultimate reward is bound to the Pit.

Class Skill: Diplomacy.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.71g6nmvy8qnodwyz]{Protection From Good} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q4ixxjb4v281g2xv]{Scorching Ray} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{Suggestion} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{Charm Monster} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q070n0zoq3zojpas]{Dominate Person} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{Planar Binding} (devils and creatures with the fiendish template only) (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5cdmojmydhwowzy1]{Teleport, Greater} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ol9newf4vrcx0kpf]{Power Word Stun} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{Meteor Swarm} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{Blind-Fight},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{Combat Expertise},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{Deceitful},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{Extend Spell},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{Improved Disarm},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Iron Will},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Knowledge [planes]),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.nWFr8SNcjcMqsXSH]{Spell Penetration}.

Bloodline Arcana: Whenever you cast a spell of the charm subschool, increase the spell’s DC by +2.
